newsitem.title: USA: Enterprise Systems acquires DBE Inc.
newsitem.headline: Enterprise Systems acquires DBE Inc.

text.p: Enterprise Systems Inc, which provides healthcare information management software, said Thursday it acquired DBE Inc of Minneapolis in a stock transaction valued at approximately $2 million.

DBE provides a number of software products and consulting services focused on Medical Cross Link, a cross referencing database designed to assist large hospitals, medical suppliers and other healthcare organizations.
Enterprise said it will integrate Medical Cross Link into its Nova.IDN client-server materials management product and into its Corporate Communications System.
